::DrillBit::

He stands up.
"There should be a complete list in the comp network," he says to Dark
Mouse.
He then turns to Killfest.
"I think we need another chair command chair in here. The ship wasn't
built with co- commanders in mind."

::Demolition::

He flew in to range, opening fire on Angel Prime.

::Dollen::

He waited for StarScream to transform.

::Hot Rod::

He didn't get a reply from Angel Prime. He started to get worried, but
stayed in his seat.
